claimReward(address).details: This function will claim rewards for all tokens being rewarded

returns._claimableAmounts: Array of claimable for token on same index in rewardTokens

initialize(address,address[]).details: Called by proxy to initialize this contract

notifyRewardAmount(address[],uint256[],u.details: Also updates reward rate and reward earning period.

params._rewardAmounts: Rewards amount for token on same index in rewardTokens array
params._rewardDurations: Duration for which reward will be distributed

returns._rewardPerTokenRate: Array of Rewards rate for token on same index in rewardTokens

devdoc.title: Distribute rewards based on vesper pool balance and supply

RewardPaid(address,address,uint256).notice: Emitted whenever any user claim rewards

RewardTokenAdded(address,address[]).notice: Emitted after adding new rewards token into rewardTokens array

addRewardToken(address).notice: Add new reward token in existing rewardsToken array

getRewardTokens().notice: Provides easy access to all rewardTokens

isRewardToken(address).notice: Reward token to valid/invalid flag mapping

lastTimeRewardApplicable(address).notice: Returns timestamp of last reward update

lastUpdateTime(address).notice: Reward token to Last reward drip update time stamp mapping

notifyRewardAmount(address[],uint256[],u.notice: Notify that reward is added. Only authorized caller can call

periodFinish(address).notice: Reward token to period ending of current reward

rewardDuration(address).notice: Reward token to Duration of current reward distribution

rewardPerTokenStored(address).notice: Reward token to Reward per token mapping. Calculated and stored at last drip update

rewardRates(address).notice: Reward token to current reward rate mapping

rewards(address,address).notice: RewardToken => User => Rewards earned till last reward update

userRewardPerTokenPaid(address,address).notice: Reward token => User => Reward per token stored at last reward update
